Component partitioning algorithms

Source: R/member_components.R
components.Rd

Component partitioning algorithms

node_components(object)

node_weak_components(object)

node_strong_components(object)

node_coreness(object)

Arguments

object

An object of a migraph-consistent class:

  • matrix (adjacency or incidence) from {base} R

  • edgelist, a data frame from {base} R or tibble from {tibble}

  • igraph, from the {igraph} package

  • network, from the {network} package

  • tbl_graph, from the {tidygraph} package

Functions

  • node_components: Returns nodes' component membership using edge direction where available.

  • node_weak_components: Returns nodes' component membership ignoring edge direction.

  • node_strong_components: Returns nodes' component membership based on edge direction.

  • node_coreness: Returns k-cores

See also

Other membership: community, equivalence

Examples

node_components(mpn_bristol)
#> 1 
#>    AddReAg, AfrInit, OrganicCoop, Wildlife, BACEN, BangladAss, Barnardos, BartonHill, BigIssue, BREAD, Stroke, CivicSoc, CyclingCamp, DialRide, Foyer, BHAM, InterFaith, JamiaMosque, MuslimCulSoc, BVEG, WestIndianParents, CareForum, CEED, DeafPeople, CentrSustEnergy, CityFarms, CND, CoopParty, COGB, RecyclNet, CSV, CycleWest, AsylumSeekers, DhekBhal, Disabled, DundryHill, EBYHousAss, EastonAsianWom, ECA, FoE, SevernRai, FullCircle, Greens, Greenleaf, Greenpeace, H&WTeenageParents, HartcliffeClubYoung, HartCommCampus, HHEAG, ISIS-MP, Kebele, KHAAS, KWDrugs, KWMedia, KWYouth, LawCentre, LGBForum, LivingEaston, Malago, Maternity, Mede, Mind, NextLink, NextStep, Nigerian, NSForum, CommonFuture, Oxfam, PakistaniWomen, Permaculture, PinkParents, PIPA, PrincessCarers, PriorYouthHousing, RailwayDevelop, RecConsort, SARI, Schumacher, SecondStep, SERA, SikhRes, SocialistParty, SOFA, Soil, SBCC, SPAdvice, StWerbergh, StopOldbury, Sustrans, Transform, UnityGroup, WECIL, Wellwomen, Womankind, WWF, CommunityFest, EastonFest, H&WCarnival, LA21, Respect, SortItFest, StPaulCarnival, WomensDay, AshtonQuarry, AsylumCampaign, Babymilk, Claimants, GlobalResist, Ikea, Jubilee2000, M32Reclaim, STAR
